class_notes: This class is exclusively for students who are admitted to the Film and Media Management concentration.
course_description: Students work with their peers and learn from established creative professionals to obtain critical perspectives on, and practical experience in, generating media content using technologies, techniques and models used by the media industries.
prerequisites: FILM 301 or FILM 301W or FILM 302 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 5213, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 1-2:15p, Instructor: N. Burton, Status: Closed
